channel.title: Need a hoster
channel.description:
Yes well i need a hoster for my server, it is just going to start, but i have big plans for it, i have the forums and everything, just the slight detail i cannot host a server, so i would really appreciate if someone willing to host would post here or contact me on my msn that is
Davilardi@hotmail.com
For hosting, all donations for the server will go to you, and also you will get owner with me in the server, i am planning on a great server with good economy and great community, anyone interested please contact me, i would really appreciate it and if your not interested please do not flame or tell me anything, i dont need your comments, i only need a hoster. Thank you
Need of hoster [size=20pt][font=Verdana]-no-[/font][/size]
please lock this...and if you want any info about the game contact me

item.title: Need a hoster
item.dc:creator: @elitebrute elitebrute
item.description:
@elitebrute wrote:

I just sent you a email from soreskyler@hotmail.com, i g2g for today, and tommorow (till 3:00 cause i have school.) I can keep server running all day (most of time unless som1 fucking logs off me…) please get a auto restarter, restarts every 10-20 minutes (that’s your job :)) Thanks if you allow me to host,
~Blessed A.K.A elitebrute on here.

BYE!!!

Read full topic
